TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PixelFormat extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the format of the color data for each pixel in the image.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The pixel format defines the number of bits of memory associated with one pixel of data. The format also defines the order of the color components within a single pixel of data.
PixelFormat48bppRGB, PixelFormat64bppARGB, and PixelFormat64bppPARGB use 16 bits per color component (channel). GDI+ version 1.0 and 1.1 can read 16-bits-per-channel images, but such images are converted to an 8-bits-per-channel format for processing, displaying, and saving. Each 16-bit color channel can hold a value in the range 0 through 2^13.
Some of the pixel formats contain premultiplied color values. Premultiplied means that the color values have already been multiplied by an alpha value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Alpha = int32(262144)

Docs.summary: The pixel data contains alpha values that are not premultiplied.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Canonical = int32(2097152)

Docs.summary: The default pixel format of 32 bits per pixel. The format specifies 24-bit color depth and an 8-bit alpha channel.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat DontCare = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No pixel format is specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Extended = int32(1048576)

Docs.summary: Reserved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format16bppArgb1555 = int32(397319)

Docs.summary: The pixel format is 16 bits per pixel. The color information specifies 32,768 shades of color, of which 5 bits are red, 5 bits are green, 5 bits are blue, and 1 bit is alpha.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format16bppGrayScale = int32(1052676)

Docs.summary: The pixel format is 16 bits per pixel. The color information specifies 65536 shades of gray.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format16bppRgb555 = int32(135173)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 16 bits per pixel; 5 bits each are used for the red, green, and blue components. The remaining bit is not used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format16bppRgb565 = int32(135174)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 16 bits per pixel; 5 bits are used for the red component, 6 bits are used for the green component, and 5 bits are used for the blue component.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format1bppIndexed = int32(196865)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the pixel format is 1 bit per pixel and that it uses indexed color. The color table therefore has two colors in it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format24bppRgb = int32(137224)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 24 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the red, green, and blue components.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format32bppArgb = int32(2498570)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the alpha, red, green, and blue components.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format32bppPArgb = int32(925707)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the alpha, red, green, and blue components. The red, green, and blue components are premultiplied, according to the alpha component.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format32bppRgb = int32(139273)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 32 bits per pixel; 8 bits each are used for the red, green, and blue components. The remaining 8 bits are not used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format48bppRgb = int32(1060876)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 48 bits per pixel; 16 bits each are used for the red, green, and blue components.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format4bppIndexed = int32(197634)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 4 bits per pixel, indexed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format64bppArgb = int32(3424269)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 64 bits per pixel; 16 bits each are used for the alpha, red, green, and blue components.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format64bppPArgb = int32(1851406)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 64 bits per pixel; 16 bits each are used for the alpha, red, green, and blue components. The red, green, and blue components are premultiplied according to the alpha component.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Format8bppIndexed = int32(198659)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the format is 8 bits per pixel, indexed. The color table therefore has 256 colors in it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Gdi = int32(131072)

Docs.summary: The pixel data contains GDI colors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Indexed = int32(65536)

Docs.summary: The pixel data contains color-indexed values, which means the values are an index to colors in the system color table, as opposed to individual color values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Max = int32(15)

Docs.summary: The maximum value for this enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat PAlpha = int32(524288)

Docs.summary: The pixel format contains premultiplied alpha values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat Undefined = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The pixel format is undefined.
